description: This table contains information about the patients on a financial assistance case record.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the financial assistance case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ASSOC_PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient associated with the financial assistance case record.

columns.name: CHILD_FIN_ASST_CASE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of a child financial assistance case record. This child record is used to store the patient specific SmartForm information for the associated patient in the related group.
